title: “Unpopular Opinions Show” - Watt Can Wait, Kirk Cousins Fate, and Dallas Going Backwards (Ep. 118)
description:
The Ringer’s Robert Mays and Kevin Clark share some skepticism about young starting quarterbacks (04:30), explain why JJ Watt will never be the same (15:30), and tell you why this year’s leading receiver isn’t named Odell, Julio, or Antonio (21:00).  Then, Danny Kelly joins the show to predict the downfall of Kirk Cousins (32:00).  Finally, Mays and Clark take aim at America’s beloved Dallas Cowboys (38:45) and the entire NFC East.
      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
